name: Ninja Turdle - Coronavirus DLC
description:
Ninja Turdle is a 2D Metroidvania platformer that involves exploring all through Steve's body destroying parasites.

The Coronavirus DLC takes place in Steve's lungs and features the Coronavirus and its various mutations. 

This area is extracted from the main Ninja Turdle game for direct access.

Each save slot imposes increasing life restrictions on Ninja Turdle. 

Beating the game in hard and hardest modes have separate rewards.

The goal of this DLC is to beat the lungs as fast as possible.

Time will stop recording and automatically be saved after beating the Coronavirus Boss. 

Note, The lungs are slightly modified from the full Ninja Turdle game. 
- You can use corn weapons against Coronaviruses.
- Exits from the lungs are blocked off.

Ninja Turdle starts the game with:
- Turd Toss
- Corn Chunker [Spread + Cornado]
- Blood Mask
- Dung Beetle
- Climb Gloves
- Double Jump Cape
- Wall Jump Boots

If you like this DLC, please try the full Ninja Turdle game! :)
